code:
import turtle

wn = turtle.Screen()
wn.bgcolor("white")

t1 = turtle.Turtle()
t1.pensize(3)
t1.color('black')
t1.penup()

t1.goto(-50, 0)
t1.pendown()

for i in range(2):
    t1.forward(250)
    t1.left(90)
    t1.forward(70)
    t1.left(90)

t1.hideturtle()
